@usedefaults

{{timestamp}}
@block
@row
h2. Repository: [$$repo|/ays81/Repo?repo=$$repo&repopath=$$repopath]

h4. Actions
{{actions:
- display: Execute blueprint
  action: /restmachine/system/atyourservice/executeBlueprint
  showresponse: True
  input:
  - name: repository
    type: hidden
    value: $$repo
  - name: role
    label: Role
    type: text
  - name: instance
    label: Instance
    type: text


- display: Install
  action: /restmachine/system/atyourservice/install
  showresponse: True
  input:
  - name: repository
    type: hidden
    value: $$repo
  - name: force
    label: Force install
    type: dropdown
    values:
    - label: False
      value: False
    - label: True
      value: True
  - name: async
    label: Async
    type: dropdown
    values:
    - label: True
      value: True
    - label: False
      value: False
  - name: role
    label: Role
    type: text
  - name: instance
    label: Instance
    type: text

}}
